messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: busy and contentious list
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/12/2003 2:18:18 PM Eastern Daylight Time, PHDRWD@aol.com ... PHDRWD, You might like to try   http://www.unschooling.com     and click on
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/12/2003 2:18:18 PM Eastern Daylight Time, PHDRWD@...
writes:


> I'd love a wonderful place to learn about unschooling, I just wish I didn't
> have to wade through so much (what I view as) extraneous discussion! I
> guess
> I'll sit back and read for a while longer. Thanks for the kind greeting.

PHDRWD,

You might like to try http://www.unschooling.com and click on the
message boards. It's easier to "pick and choose" what you'd like to read
there. It can get cantakerous sometimes too (folks both places are Very
serious about unschooling and its related ideas), but generally only in one
thread or another, not the whole board!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: busy and contentious list
messages.msgSnippet: I d love a wonderful place to learn about unschooling, I just wish I didn t have to wade through so much (what I view as) extraneous discussion!  I guess I ll
messages.messageBody:
I'd love a wonderful place to learn about unschooling, I just wish I didn't
have to wade through so much (what I view as) extraneous discussion! I guess
I'll sit back and read for a while longer. Thanks for the kind greeting.

> It's a wonderful place if you want to learn about unschooling and peaceful
> parenting---there's no better (the message boards are good too! and has a
> few
> other voices that don't show here!)! Sometimes it's best to just sit back
> and read.
>



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
